message: Let's split it evenly, it's a fair start!
You can have a smaller share, but I'll give you a better deal than the even split!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I still want a decent chunk too!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking the lion's share!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going down without a fight!
